title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4607.11 - Disapproval procedure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4607.11 - Disapproval procedure

State Regulations

If the application is not approved, the commission shall
give due notice in writing to the applicant, who may, within 10 days of receipt
thereof, request a hearing to be held upon the qualifications of the applicant
and the merits of the application. At the hearing the burden of proof shall be
on the applicant to establish eligibility for a license. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

4607.11

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
